introSection.mainSubtitle: Start reducing costs and transforming customer and citizen experiences with Gataca’s decentralized digital identity solution
introSection.mainParagraph: We provide your organization or community with the necesary tools to manage secure 100% digital identification systems.

digitalIdentities.title: Digital Identities
digitalIdentities.description: “We use identity credentials daily to access local citizen services, prove employment status or file an insurance claim. But as we have rapidly transformed our lives online, identification and authentication systems have not kept up.”
